name: Soups On! (Austin Sevigny)
description:
You take on the role of an up-and-coming chef who needs to start with the basics in order to master the way of food. There is no better way to start than with soup, with hungry customers and your staff depending on you there is nothing else to do but create. With trial and error, you will become a master soup craftsman just like in a real kitchen. 

Created By 

Austin Sevigny and Jared Prespolis
